subject: Baseball
Auctions
Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: If a two-day auction of Joe DiMaggio's life inventory that began Friday in Manhattan says anything about the Yankee Clipper it is that he discarded little that meant anything to him.
snippet: If a two-day auction of Joe DiMaggio's life inventory that began Friday in Manhattan says anything about the Yankee Clipper it is that he discarded little that meant anything to him.
